Message:
Not a single person believed
I’d accomplish anything.

All they wanted from me was
to leave my sisters to die,
and to banish my grandmother
from the forest.

My personal guard, Hilda,
didn’t believe in me either.
All she ever did was
worry about me.

But even so,
I refused to give up.
I couldn’t give up.

My mother, the person
I had always admired,
entrusted her dying wish to me.

I pushed through
the fear and anxiety,
and searched desperately
for someone who could
lend me their strength...

Half a year passed.
I received help from a human
who had fallen down
from Heaven’s Ocean.
Thanks to the strange
power they possessed,
we defeated the witch.

Those who had been
affected by the curse,
like me with my feet,
didn’t turn back to normal...

But at the very least,
we don’t need to live in
fear of the curse anymore.

It may take a while,
but I’m sure that with time,
people will be able to smile
and live in peace once more.

The days that my mother
fought so hard to protect
will surely return.

That’s why...please watch
over us, dear mother.

Your village...
Your dear family...
all have bright futures
ahead of them.
